TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The tumor was completely removed by surgery and no cancer cells were found at the edges of the area where the tumor was removed. Cancer has not spread to lymph nodes. Before the tumor was removed, one of the following was true: (1) cancer had spread to the renal sinus (the part of the kidney where it joins the ureter); or (2) cancer had spread to blood vessels outside the area of the kidney where urine is made, such as the renal sinus.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage II Wilms tumor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "tumor de Wilms en estadio II"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: tumor de Wilms en estadio II

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Se extirpó todo el tumor mediante cirugía y no se encontraron células cancerosas en los bordes del área de donde se extirpó. El cáncer no se diseminó a los ganglios linfáticos. Antes de extirpar el tumor, se presentó una de las siguientes situaciones: 1) el cáncer se diseminó al seno renal (parte del riñón que se une con el uréter); 2) el cáncer se diseminó a los vasos sanguíneos por fuera del área del riñón en donde se elabora la orina, como el seno renal.

RelatedInformation.RelatedSummaryRef: Tratamiento del tumor de Wilms y otros tumores renales infantiles
